text: Both of my kids are attending the Abacus class here, and they’ve been really enjoying it! Ms. Ng is their teacher, and she’s been absolutely wonderful. She’s very passionate, patient, and genuinely cares about helping the kids learn and improve. I’ve seen great progress in both my children since they started. Highly recommend this centre and especially Ms. Ng for anyone considering Abacus classes!
Ms Ng is a very caring and attentive teacher. My kids love her. The most important thing is she is able to teach them according to their levels.

author_name: My Precious Gem My Precious Gem
